resources.string: Sorry, you took too much time!
Speed is Key! Are you ready?
2. Type URL of interest to retrieve images, e.g. https://stocksnap.io
3. Press Fetch button and 20 images will appear
4. Choose 6 images and game will start
5. Find 6 matching pairs. Fastest hand wins.
6. When 6 pairs match, score will be multiplied depending on your finish time
(i) +9 points if matching card is found in less then 3 seconds
(ii +7 points if matching card is found in 3 to 5 seconds
(iii) +5 points if matching card is found in more then 5 seconds
(iv) Points reset to remainder of 19, i.e. 1-18, if it is not matched
(i) Points x54 if game finishes in less then 15 seconds
(ii) Points x36 if game finishes in 25 to 30 seconds
(iii) Points x3 if game finishes in more then 55 seconds
